people_also_ask.question: How good is Soul Calibur?
people_also_ask.heading: VERDICT. We're spoiled for choice with fighting games these days but SoulCalibur 6 might just be the best of the lot. ... It's an immediately fun fighting game that has clear depth but never seems intimidating. It has one of the better rosters of any current fighting game, some beefy single player content and solid netcode ...22-Oct-2018
